mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(EquipmentID,'_', Alm_Element,'_',AlmIndex) AS id, CONCAT(EquipmentID,'_', Alm_Element) AS equipmentId, MAX ( DateTime ) AS lastAlmTime, MIN ( DateTime ) AS almTime, LEVEL as level, AlmText AS almText, COUNT(*) AS almNum FROM OnAlm where Level =1 GROUP BY EquipmentID, Alm_Element, AlmIndex, LEVEL, AlmText order by lastAlmTime desc,almTime desc
